scripts.postinstall: cp -f manifest.firefox.json manifest.json && (test -d lib || mkdir lib) && cp ./node_modules/vue/dist/vue.js ./lib/vue.js && cp ./node_modules/fuse.js/dist/fuse.js ./lib/fuse.js && cp ./node_modules/webextension-polyfill/dist/browser-polyfill.js ./lib/browser-polyfill.js
scripts.build: cp -f manifest.firefox.json manifest.json && web-ext build -o --ignore-files yarn.lock
scripts.build-chrome: cp -f manifest.chrome.json manifest.json && web-ext build -o --ignore-files yarn.lock
scripts.sign: cp -f manifest.firefox.json manifest.json && web-ext sign --ignore-files yarn.lock
